## Biggest New Class Fall 2018

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

fall_2017 <- read_excel("class_enrollment_summary_by_term_10.20.17.xlsx", skip = 2, col_names = TRUE)
fall_2018 <- read_excel("class_enrollment_summary_by_term_10.20.17.xlsx", skip = 2, col_names = TRUE)


fall_2018 %>% 
  mutate(class_title = parse_factor(`Course Title`, levels = NULL)) %>% 
  group_by(class_title) %>% 
  summarise(total_enrollment = sum(Total))

fall_2017_courses <- distinct(factor(fall_2017$`Course Title`))

```
